overview: In this experimental film of edited found footage, a certain commercial keeps inserting itself into other commercials, to the dismay of the network airing them and to the neutrality (for the most part) of the captivated audience.  Why does the commercial keep sneaking its way into the programming? How are they getting away with this?  Do you want to find out? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WtMmRlvNtgs
tagline: They're double-toasted, double-crispin' good! General Mills makes them just the way they should!
title: Consume Cornflake
